topic.title: Windows Service Reports 'Incorrect Function When Started'

keywords.indexterm: Installing OxygenTCP floating license serverWindows 32-bitIncorrect Function error

section.title: Problem
section.p: My TCP floating license server reports an "Incorrect Function" error message when starting the Windows service.

section.title: Cause
section.p: This usually appears because the Windows service launcher cannot locate a Java virtual machine on your system.

section.title: Solution
section.p: Make sure that you have installed a 32-bit Java SE from Oracle (or Sun) on the system: .
